prompts: Create a fierce fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a wild mane.
I want a playful Pokemon with fluffy white fur that loves to wrestle.
Generate a small, agile Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a monkey, full of energy and mischief.
Imagine a bipedal creature with a robust frame, ready to take on any challenge.
Design a Pokemon with a fierce expression and a knack for physical attacks.
